channel.title: The surprise zombie in Lambda Core
channel.description: When you activate a generator (don't remember if 1st or 2nd one) there is a security guard zombie torso that appears behind you out of nowhere. This is plain stupid, as it's unrealistic because the zombie didn't have any place to come from, and also it doesn't leave the player almost any chance to counter it. It's like a zombie has been suddenly cheated into the game. This is just stupid and should be removed.

Personally, I think it’s not such a big deal and, also, it’s easily fixable: place an airduct behind the zombie. Make it lead vertically up, so that players can’t get far inside it.

item.title: The surprise zombie in Lambda Core
item.dc:creator: Ed1
item.description:
Xeoxer:

and also it doesn’t leave the player almost any chance to counter it.

Whiz around, get a jolt from sudden zombie appearance, switch to glock/MP5/Magnum/Shotgun/Crossbow/Tau Cannon/Gluon Gun/Crowbar and attack the head. Point blank with those weapons is guaranteed to mince that zombie within a second; you’d have to be admiring the detail of the switchbox for the zombie to actually leave you “almost any chance of countering it.”

Xeoxer:

This is just stupid[COLOR=‘Orange’]ly funny

Fixed it for you

It isn’t a bug, not in my eyes, the first time it gave me a good scare heh, then second time, when I was prepared…the very moment I hit the use key, I whizzed right around and lo and behold, it magically appeared right there, couldn’t stop laughing all the while crowbarring its face off.
